title: Chromas not loading?
body: Chromas not loading in the new draft mode?

replies.body:
Heya sickxapples - 

Thanks for the report! 

This is a known issue with the new champion select. This should be resolved in the next patch.
Once again Riot KateyKhaos, you're awesome as ever! :) I noticed on the pbe notes today, well done! ^^
